name: linux-user-management
description: Creates and Manages Linux user groups
long_description:
linux-user-management Cookbook ========================== This cookbook creates 3 groups in Linux - support - operations - troubleshoot - `apache2` - `php` Attributes ---------- #### nestle-dolcegusto::default
Key Type Description Default
['nestle-dolcegusto']['bacon'] Boolean whether to include bacon true
Usage ----- Just include `linux-user-management` in your node's `run_list`: ```json { "name":"my_node", "run_list": [ "recipe[nestle-dolcegusto]" ] } ``` License and Authors ------------------- Authors: - Vikram Venkataravana Reddy
